results.title: [Investigation of glycaemic and nutritional status of patients suffering from cancer.]
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ treated by non-insulin antidiabetics, taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was accompanied by the lowest incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Calcinosis_Cutis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092182 @@@metastatic@@@ stage, the highest body mass index and @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@ level.

citations.NLM: Bánhegyi RJ, Veréb B, Mátrai ÁA, Rácz B, Beke S. [Investigation of glycaemic and nutritional status of patients suffering from cancer.] Orv Hetil. 2023 Jun 11;164(23):900-910. PMID: 37302126

results.title: Metformin inhibits the development and metastasis of ovarian cancer.
results.text_hl: The size and number of the inoculated             and @<m>DISEASE_Calcinosis_Cutis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092182 @@@metastatic@@@ @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumours@@@ in vivo in a nude @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ were determined following intraperitoneal             injection of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Wu B, Li S, Sheng L, Zhu J, Gu L, Shen H, La D, Hambly BD, Bao S, Di W. Metformin inhibits the development and metastasis of ovarian cancer. Oncol Rep. 2012 Sep;28(3):903-8. PMID: 22752027

results.title: The effect of metformin and thiazolidinedione use on lung cancer in diabetics
results.text_hl: Those who were receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and/or a @CHEMICAL_2_4_thiazolidinedione @CHEMICAL_MESH:C089946 @@@TZD@@@ were more likely to present with @<m>DISEASE_Calcinosis_Cutis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092182 @@@metastatic disease@@@ (39.8% vs. 28.2%, p = 0.008).

citations.NLM: Mazzone PJ, Rai H, Beukemann M, Xu M, Jain A, Sasidhar M. The effect of metformin and thiazolidinedione use on lung cancer in diabetics BMC Cancer. 2012 Sep 14;12():410. PMID: 22978440

results.title: Inhibition of the GTPase Rac1 mediates the antimigratory effects of metformin in prostate cancer cells.
results.text_hl: Here, we show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces the formation of @DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@metastases@@@ to fewer solid organs in an orthotopic @<m>DISEASE_Calcinosis_Cutis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092182 @@@metastatic@@@ @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@ cell model established in nude @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Dirat B, Ader I, Golzio M, Massa F, Mettouchi A, Laurent K, Larbret F, Malavaud B, Cormont M, Lemichez E, Cuvillier O, Tanti JF, Bost F. Inhibition of the GTPase Rac1 mediates the antimigratory effects of metformin in prostate cancer cells. Mol Cancer Ther. 2015 Feb;14(2):586-96. PMID: 25527635

results.title: Association between glucose-lowering treatment and cancer metastasis among patients with preexisting type 2 diabetes and incident malignancy.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Calcinosis_Cutis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092182 @@@Metastatic@@@ risk was lower with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ plus or minus @GENE_DPP4 @GENE_1803 @@@DPP-4@@@ inhibitors (HR 0.84, 95% CI 0.79-0.90 and 0.87, 0.80-0.95, respectively), not significantly associated with @GENE_DPP4 @GENE_1803 @@@DPP-4@@@ inhibitors (0.99, 0.77-1.29) except after @DISEASE_Thyroid_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D013964 @@@thyroid cancer@@@ (3.89, 1.01-9.64), and higher with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ therapy (1.81, 1.46-2.24) compared to no-AD use for all @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancers@@@ combined.

citations.NLM: Noh Y, Jeon SM, Shin S. Association between glucose-lowering treatment and cancer metastasis among patients with preexisting type 2 diabetes and incident malignancy. Int J Cancer. 2019 Apr 1;144(7):1530-1539. PMID: 30229901

results.title: Metformin may protect nondiabetic breast cancer women from metastasis.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly decreased the numbers of @<m>DISEASE_Calcinosis_Cutis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092182 @@@metastatic@@@ cases after 6-HT.

citations.NLM: El-Haggar SM, El-Shitany NA, Mostafa MF, El-Bassiouny NA. Metformin may protect nondiabetic breast cancer women from metastasis. Clin Exp Metastasis. 2016 Apr;33(4):339-57. PMID: 26902691
